name: Lion Enclosure
description: Enclosure for lions with open grasslands and rocky terrain.

name: Elephant Habitat
description: Spacious habitat for elephants with mud baths and water features.

name: Giraffe Enclosure
description: Enclosure with tall trees and feeding platforms for giraffes.

name: Tiger Enclosure
description: Enclosure with dense jungle vegetation and rocky caves for tigers.

name: Penguin Exhibit
description: Exhibit with a pool and icebergs for penguins.

name: Monkey Habitat
description: Habitat with trees and ropes for monkeys to swing and play.

name: Reptile House
description: Building housing various reptiles, including snakes and lizards.
